Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to witness testimony before legislative committees via videoconferencing
Summary: Relates to permitting witness testimony before legislative committees via videoconferencing upon a request for reasonable accommodation by a witness and the demonstration by the witness of an inability to testify in-person.
LawCode: Amd ยง60, Leg L; amd ยง103, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law and the public officers law, in relation to witness testimony before legislative committees via videoconferencing
